api.description: This is an API to interact with flashcard db

command.description: This API checks if the account(uid) exits, if not, adds it to database

index.description: Check account, return uid and roleid

command.description: This API lets you list all course info

post.description: List all course codes under a specific course department, POST parameters [dept]

command.description: This API lets you count the number of flashcards under a specific course (dept, code)

index.description: Counts all flashcards if course (dept, code) is not specific

post.description: Count all flashcards under a specific course department, POST parameters [dept, code]

command.description: This API lets you list public flashcards under a specific course (dept, code)

post.description: List all public flashcards under a specific course department, POST parameters [dept, code]

command.description: This API lets you list/add/edit/delete flashcard

get.description:
Retrieve a flashcard with id, REST parameter [flashcard]
Return Format [question, answer, course_dept, course_code, creator(uid or 'anonymous'), private(0 or 1), upvotes, downvotes]

post.description: Add a flashcard, POST parameters [question, answer, course_dept, course_code, private(0 or 1), anonymous(0 & 1)]

command.description: This API lets you edit a flashcards

post.description: Edit a flashcard, POST parameters [id, question, answer, course_dept, course_code]

command.description: This API lets you upvote a flashcard

post.description: Upvote a flashcard, POST parameter [flashcard_id]

command.description: This API lets you downvote a flashcard

post.description: Downvote a flashcard, POST parameter [flashcard_id]

command.description: This API lets you list your own decks

index.description: List all decks for a user

command.description: This API lets you list flashcards in a specific deck

index.description: If a deck is not specified, list flashcards for a user, incluing those not in any decks

post.description: List flashcards in a deck, POST parameter [deck_id]

command.description: This API lets you shuffle flashcards in a specific deck

index.description: Indexing is DISABLED, if a deck is not specified

post.description: Shuffle flashcards in a deck, POST parameter [deck_id]

command.description: This API lets you count the number of flashcards in a specific deck

index.description: If a deck is not specified, count the flashcards in all decks

post.description: Count flashcards in a deck, POST parameter [deck_id]

command.description: This API lets you create your own deck

post.description: Create a deck for a user, POST parameter [name]

command.description: This API lets you rename your own deck

post.description: Rename a deck for a user, POST parameter [deck_id, new_name]

command.description: This API lets you delete your own deck

post.description: Delete a deck owned by a user, POST parameter [deck_id]

command.description: This API lets you add a flashcard to a deck

post.description: Add a flashcard to a deck, POST parameter [deck_id, flashcard_id]

command.description: This API lets you remove a flashcard from a deck

post.description: Remove a flashcard from a deck, POST parameter [deck_id, flashcard_id]

command.description: This API lets you retrieve whether a flashcard in a deck is known to a user

post.description: Get the "knwon" field of a flashcard, POST parameter [deck_id, flashcard_id]

command.description: This API lets you toggle the "known" field of a flashcard in a deck

post.description: Toggle the "knwon" field of a flashcard, POST parameter [deck_id, flashcard_id]

command.description: This API lets you reset "known" field to 0 of all flashcars in a deck

post.description: Reset "knwon" field to of all flashcards in a deck, POST parameter [deck_id

command.description: This API lets you list/create/delete tags

post.description: Create a tag, POST parameter [label]

command.description: This API lets you search flashcards by a tag

index.description: List all flashcards, if tag label is not specified

post.description: List flashcards with a specific tag, POST parameter [label]

command.description: This API lets you tag a flashcard

post.description: Tag a flashcard, POST parameter [tag_label, flashcard_id]

command.description: This API lets you remove a tag from a flashcard

post.description: Remove a tag, POST parameter [tag_label, flashcard_id]

command.description: This API lets you list tags of flashcard

post.description: List tags of a flashcard, POST parameter [flashcard_id]
